text: Ni shuo:“Women quexin zhenzhu, quexin women suo shou de qishi, yu yi bo la xin, yi sima yi, yi si ha ge, ye er gu bai he ge zhipai suo shou de qishi, yu mu sa, er sa he zhong xianzhi suo shou ci yu tamen de zhu de jingdian, women duiyu tamen zhong de renhe ren, dou bu jiayi qishi, women zhi guishun ta.”
